The National Near-Earth Object Preparedness Strategy and Action Plan will improve our nation's preparedness to address the hazard of near-earth objects, the impacts, the deep impacts over the next 10 years.  Its primary role is to help organize and coordinate near-Earth object-related efforts within the federal departments and agencies of the federal government, with a particular focus on the efforts that are already existing and resourced.  It seeks to leverage and enhance existing assets and capabilities, national and international, public and private, to effectively manage the risk associated with near-Earth objects.
